original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 21.55. Piṭṭhiduka, Sanidassanattika
analyzed: piṭṭhi duka sani dassana ttika

original: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na dassanena pahātabbam na sa nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca na dassanena pahātabbaḥ sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe vipāke ekam pe avigate tīṇi

analyzed: na bhāvanāya pahātabbam na sa nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca na bhāvanāya pahātabbaḥ sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

analyzed: na pariyāpannam na sa nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca pariyāpannaḥ sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Naniyyānikaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca aniyyāniko sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na niyyānikam na sa nidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca aniyyānikaḥ sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe vipāke ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: Naniyataṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca aniyato sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na niyatam na sa nidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca aniyataḥ sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe vipāke ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasauttaraṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sauttaro sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na sauttaram na sanidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca sauttaraḥ sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
analyzed: na saraṇam na sa nidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca araṇaḥ sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka

original: Naaraṇaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
analyzed: na araṇam na sa nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca araṇaḥ sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca naaraṇaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na saraṇam na sanidassana sappaṭigham ca na araṇam na sanidassana sappaṭigham ca dhammam paṭicca araṇaḥ sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe vipāke ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: (Anidassanasappaṭighe tīṇiyeva.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe ekaṁ …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: anidassana sa paṭighe tīṇi yeva hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe aññamaññe ekam pe vipāke ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasaraṇaṁ naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṁkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ…pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na saraṇam na anidassana appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca araṇaḥ anidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā sakhitta hetuyā eka adhipatiyā eka pe avigate eka

original: Paccanīya
analyzed: paccanīya

original: Nahetu-naārammaṇa
analyzed: na hetuna ārammaṇa

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
analyzed: na saraṇam na sanidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca araṇaḥ sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati na hetu paccayā eka

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo
analyzed: na saraṇam na sa nidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca araṇaḥ sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Nahetuyā ekaṁ, naārammaṇe tīṇi,
analyzed: uppajjati na ārammaṇa paccayā tīṇi saṅkhitta na hetuyā eka na ārammaṇe tīṇi

original: naadhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… nakamme ekaṁ, naāhāre naindriye najhāne namagge ekaṁ …pe… novigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na adhipatiyā tīṇi pe na kamme eka na āhāre na indriye na jhāne na magge ekam pe no vigate tīṇi

original: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetu paccayāḥ na ārammaṇe tīṇi

original: Naārammaṇapaccayā hetuyā tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na ārammaṇa paccayāḥ hetuyā tīṇi

original: (Sahajātavārampi paccayavārampi nissayavārampi saṁsaṭṭhavārampi sampayuttavārampi vitthāretabbaṁ.)
analyzed: sahajāta vāram pi paccaya vāram pi nissaya vāram pi sa saṭṭha vāram pi sampayutta vāram pi

original: 21.55.7. Pañhāvāra
analyzed: pañhāvāra

original: Hetu
analyzed: hetu

original: Nasaraṇo nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo araṇassa sanidassanasappaṭighassa dhammassa
analyzed: na sa raṇaḥ na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ araṇassa sa nidassana sappaṭighassa dhammassa

original: hetupaccayena paccayo. Naaraṇo nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo araṇassa sanidassanasappaṭighassa
analyzed: hetu paccayena paccayaḥ na araṇaḥ na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammaḥ araṇassa sa nidassana sa paṭighassa

original: dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Hetuyā dve, adhipatiyā dve …pe… sahajāte nissaye tīṇi, pacchājāte kamme dve, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre indriye jhāne magge vippayutte dve …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā dve adhipatiyā dve pe sahajāte nissaye tīṇi pacchājāte kamme dve vipāke ekaḥ āhāre indriye jhāne magge vippayutte dve pe avigate tīṇi

original: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṁ, evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
analyzed: yathā kusala ttike pañhāvārassa anulomam pi paccanīyam pi anuloma paccanīyam pi paccanīya anulomam pi gaṇitaḥ evam gaṇetabba
